definition: A term commonly used to refer to a planned meeting or arrangement between individuals, typically facilitated through electronic means or social platforms. It often involves the exchange of personal information and serves as an initial point of contact for establishing further communication or potential relationships.

examples.german: Ich habe gestern eine Kontaktdate gehabt.
Er hat eine Kontaktdate mit seiner neuen Freundin.
examples.english: He has a date with his new girlfriend.

examples.german: Sie hat eine Kontaktdate über eine Dating-App arrangiert.
examples.english: She arranged a date through a dating app.

examples.german: Wir haben eine Kontaktdate für nächste Woche geplant.
examples.english: We have planned a date for next week.

examples.german: Die Kontaktdate war sehr schön und wir haben uns gut verstanden.
examples.english: The date was very nice and we got along well.
